verses.verse: And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was brought down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and Potiphar, <S%H6318><s%> an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard, <S%H2876><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H376><s%> <S%H4713><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> him of the hands <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the Ishmaelites, <S%H3459><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had brought him down <S%H3381><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and he was <S%H1961><s%> a prosperous <S%H6743><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> and he was <S%H1961><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> the Egyptian. <S%H4713><s%>

And his master <S%H113><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with <S%H854><s%> him, and that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in his sight, <S%H5869><s%> and he served <S%H8334><s%> him: and he made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that he had <S%H3426><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> from the time <S%H4480><s%> <S%H227><s%> that he had made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had, <S%H3426><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Egyptian's <S%H4713><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for Joseph's sake; <S%H1558><s%> <S%H3130><s%> and the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H3426><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

And he left <S%H5800><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had in Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand; <S%H3027><s%> and he knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> aught <S%H3972><s%> he had, <S%H854><s%> save <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> did eat. <S%H398><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a goodly <S%H3303><s%> <S%H8389><s%> person, and well <S%H3303><s%> favored. <S%H4758><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that his master's <S%H113><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> her eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> Lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me.

But he refused, <S%H3985><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his master's <S%H113><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> me in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and he hath committed <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath <S%H3426><s%> to my hand; <S%H3027><s%>

There is none <S%H369><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> I; neither <S%H3808><s%> hath he kept back <S%H2820><s%> any thing <S%H3972><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thee, because <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art his wife: <S%H802><s%> how <S%H349><s%> then can I do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> and sin <S%H2398><s%> against God? <S%H430><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> that he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, to lie <S%H7901><s%> by <S%H681><s%> her, or to be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> her.

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> about this <S%H2088><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> that Joseph went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> his business; <S%H4399><s%> and there was none <S%H369><s%> <S%H376><s%> of the men <S%H4480><s%> <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> within. <S%H1004><s%>

And she caught <S%H8610><s%> him by his garment, <S%H899><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me: and he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and got <S%H3318><s%> him out. <S%H2351><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he had left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and was fled <S%H5127><s%> forth, <S%H2351><s%>

That she called <S%H7121><s%> unto the men <S%H376><s%> of her house, <S%H1004><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> unto them, saying, <S%H559><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> he hath brought in <S%H935><s%> a Hebrew <S%H376><s%> <S%H5680><s%> unto us to mock <S%H6711><s%> us; he came in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me to lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me, and I cried <S%H7121><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice: <S%H6963><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when he heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I lifted up <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> with <S%H681><s%> me, and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and got <S%H3318><s%> him out. <S%H2351><s%>
And she laid up <S%H5117><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by <S%H681><s%> her, until <S%H5704><s%> his lord <S%H113><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H413><s%> home. <S%H1004><s%>

And she spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him according to these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> servant, <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> unto us, came in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me to mock <S%H6711><s%> me:

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as I lifted up <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> with <S%H681><s%> me, and fled <S%H5127><s%> out. <S%H2351><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when his master <S%H113><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> After this <S%H428><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> to me; that his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

And Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> master <S%H113><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him, and put <S%H5414><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> the prison, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> prisoners <S%H615><s%> were bound: <S%H631><s%> and he was <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the prison. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and showed <S%H5186><s%> <S%H413><s%> him mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> him favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%>

And the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> committed <S%H5414><s%> to Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the prisoners <S%H615><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the prison; <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the doer <S%H6213><s%> of it.

The keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H369><s%> to <S%H853><s%> any thing <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3972><s%> that was under his hand; <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with <S%H854><s%> him, and that which <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> did, <S%H6213><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made it to prosper. <S%H6743><s%>
